neo.title: When exchanging from any direction to NEO, you can specify the exchange amount to be converted into whole NEO. Choose the amount that suits you below

statusMW.title: Applicaton №{{order_number}} successfully created and accepted for processing!
statusMW.subtitle: You can track the status of the application in your Personal Account. Please make sure that the funds have been successfully debited from your account. If you have any questions, we will be happy to help you in the online chat or by e-mail of our technical support support@kassa.cc. Sincerely, Your Kassa!

secondStep.title: Second step
secondStep.policy: I agree with conditoins and terms

cardVerification.title: Verification card
cardVerification.vefirDescription: This is the first time you make an exchange with this card on our service. For the security of your funds, verification of the Card is required. The procedure is one-time and takes from 1 to 5 minutes.
cardVerification.verifPause: In period from 11:00 PM to 7:00 PM (GMT+3) there may be delays in verification
cardVerification.waiting: Wait until the process of card verification unfinished
cardVerification.info: Please take a photo of your bank card with any device on the background of the monitor (screen) of the computer with the open tab of the Kassa.cc website.

instructions.first: The photo of the card with nubmer and name should be readable
instructions.second: In the background (behind the card) there should be a monitor with an open tab of the site Kassa.cc

cardVerification.weChecking: We are checking your card. The service will automatically send you a notification as soon as the verification process is over
cardVerification.error: Card verification error. Try again following the instructions

thirdStepPaymentSystem.title: Third step
thirdStepPaymentSystem.agreeConditions: I agree with conditoins and terms
thirdStepPaymentSystem.clickToGo: Click «Go now» to go to the payment page. Attention! You need to pay for the application within 20 minutes. If during this time you cannot make a payment, just create a new application
thirdStepPaymentSystem.checkRequisites: Check the payment details and pay for the application in {время}

thirdStepCrypto.checkRequisites: Check the payment details and pay for the application in {время}
thirdStepCrypto.tapToPay: After the transfer, click on the button below «I paid»

thirdStepCheque.info: Enter the number {{wallet_name}} and the activation code. If you need to add another code, click «Add another check»
thirdStepCheque.requireCheque: Be sure to include one or more checks

finalStep.title: Final step
finalStep.waitText: We are waiting for the funds to be credited to our account. As soon as the funds are credited, we will automatically redirect you to your Personal Account.
finalStep.orderNum: Application №{{order_number}} successfully created and accepted for processing
finalStep.trackStatus: You can track the status of the application in your Personal Account. Please make sure that the funds have been successfully debited from your account. If you have any questions, we will be happy to help you in the online chat or by e-mail of our technical support support@kassa.cc. Sincerely, Your Kassa!

statusTxt.paid: We will process your application within 20 minutes after the funds are credited to our account.
statusTxt.waiting: We are waiting for the funds to be credited to our account. As soon as the funds are credited, we will automatically redirect you to your Personal Account.
statusTxt.payNotConfirm: Application payment №${{order_number}} not received. You can see the status of the application in your personal account. If you paid for the application and see this page, write to technical support.

profileData.title: Main profile data
profileData.canChange: You can change main account settings and write out data for communication
profileData.mailNotVerified: Your e-mail is not verified. A confirmation message has been sent to your email

myWallets.title: My wallets
myWallets.addWallet: To add a wallet, you need to make an exchange

safety.title: Safety
safety.changePassword: To change your password, enter your old password and repeat your new password twice
safety.newPasswordNotValid: The password must contain 8 symbols and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters of English alphabet

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.ifQuestions: If you have got any technical or financial questions, write us and we will help you. We answer on questions queries within 15-60 minutes depending on load service.
contacts.cooperationText: If you have a proposal for cooperation, connection of monitoring, questions about advertising, adding a new currency - write, we are always open for cooperation!

newPassword.title: New password
newPassword.info: The password must contain 8 symbols and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters of English alphabet

ordersList.title: My applications
ordersList.emptyOrdersList: You don't have any applications yet

orderStatusTxt.processing: Your application is being processed. Processing time takes from 10 to 20 minutes
orderStatusTxt.checkPayment: We check your translation. As soon as the verification is completed, we will begin processing your application.

auth.title: Authorization
auth.writeEmailText: Enter the email address you used when registering. We will send you an email with a link to reset your password
auth.imageCode: Enter the code from the image
auth.recoveryMailSended: Email with link to reset password successfully sent!
auth.recoveryMailSendedSubtitle: Follow the link in the email to continue

registration.title: Registration
registration.conditions: The password must contain 8 symbols and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters of English alphabet.
registration.agreeWithStatement: I agree with conditoins and terms
registration.info: The password must contain 8 symbols and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters of English alphabet.

errorsAndPopups.title: Errors and popups
errorsAndPopups.decreaseCost: Amount is greater than the maximum - {{sum}}
errorsAndPopups.cantAccept: We cannot accept this amount from you, change it to a few coins

technicalBreakInExchange.title: Technical break
technicalBreakInExchange.breakDescriptionPopUp: Our service is on a technical break

technicalBreak.title: Technical break
technicalBreak.breakDescription: - this is the time that we allocate on the site in order to quickly recalculate the entire system for further work at current rates and profitable offers
technicalBreak.apology: We try to reduce the time of a technical break or remove it altogether
